0.description: Arrive and register for the event at the designated check-in area on the 1st Floor.
0.name: Check-In

1.description: Kick off the hackathon with our opening ceremony at 6:00 PM EST in MLC 101, featuring a welcome speech, event schedule overview, expectations, sponsor introductions, and challenge briefings to get everyone pumped for a weekend of innovation.
1.name: Opening Ceremony

2.description: Satisfy your hunger with a delicious assortment of sandwiches and refreshments available on the 2nd Floor.
2.name: Dinner

3.description: A dedicated session for newcomers to hacking, providing guidance and tips to help first-time hackers navigate the event successfully.
3.name: First Time Hackers

4.description: An in-depth technical presentation by HPCC Systems, offering insights into their technology and tools.
4.name: HPCC Systems Tech Overview

5.description: A hands-on workshop focused on API integration and best practices for developers.
5.name: API Workshop

6.description: Introduction to the State Farm sponsored challenge, detailing the objectives, expectations, and potential rewards for participants.
6.name: State Farm Challenge Intro

7.description: Start your day with a nutritious breakfast served on the 2nd Floor to fuel your creativity.
7.name: Breakfast

8.description: Learn the ins and outs of version control with Git in this practical workshop, essential for any collaborative coding project.
8.name: Git Workshop

9.description: Overview of the HPCC Systems sponsored challenge, outlining what's at stake and how to compete.
9.name: HPCC Systems Challenge Overview

10.description: Take a break from coding with a relaxing yoga session, perfect for clearing your mind and stretching your muscles.
10.name: Yoga

11.description: Compete with fellow hackers or just have fun playing Mario Kart 8 in this casual gaming side event.
11.name: Mario Kart 8

12.description: An introductory workshop on UI/UX design principles, aimed at enhancing user interface and experience in your projects.
12.name: UI/UX Intro

13.description: Gain insights into what it's like to work at a FAANG company in this informative tech talk.
13.name: Life at FAANG

14.description: Deep dive into database technologies and learn how to effectively manage data in your applications.
14.name: Databases Workshop

15.description: Enjoy a midday meal and recharge for the afternoon's activities with lunch on the 2nd Floor.
15.name: Lunch

16.description: Unwind and relax in the Chill Space, a perfect spot to take a break from the hackathon hustle.
16.name: Chill Space Opens

17.description: Explore your artistic side with a paint workshop, a creative outlet for when you need a break from coding.
17.name: Paint Workshop Opens

18.description: Discover the future of AI and learn how to extract memories from an Xbox in this forward-thinking tech talk.
18.name: AI Futures: Pulling Memory from Xbox

19.description: Dive into web development in this session that covers the latest trends and technologies in creating web applications.
19.name: Web Dev

20.description: Join MLH for a workshop on Soroban, their latest tech offering, and learn how it can enhance your hacking experience.
20.name: MLH: Soroban

21.description: Experience a fiery discussion with Women in CS while tackling spicy wings in this unique and hot side event.
21.name: Women in CS Hot Ones
